document_data.name: Casimir
document_data.Description: He had very pale skin, long, white hair, and a matching full beard. Casimir clad himself in a voluminous, high-collared blue robe, over which he wore a cloak made from red fabric and fur. He also wore a red hat ornamented with a horned skull.
document_data.Personality: In his old age, Casimir grew to become a bitter person.
document_data.Possessions: Casimir owned a ''[[necklace of adaptation]]'', a ''[[mirror of mental prowess]]'', and a ''[[robe of scintillating colors]]'', as well as a ''[[ring of protection]] +5''.
document_data.History: As a young wizard, Casimir was of a goodly disposition. After suffering years of defeat and witnessing rampant corruption, he grew to become evil.
document_data.Activities: Casimir spent most of his time creating evil [[magic]]al items in his laboratory. He frequently used his ''[[mirror of mental prowess]]'' to travel to other planes.
